generalize.translation[0].definitions[0]: to form a general principle or opinion after considering only a small number of facts or examples
She has a tendency to generalize from her husband to all men.
generalize.translation[0].definitions[1]: to make a general statement about the whole of a group or thing
It is difficult to generalise about the kind of people who come on these courses.
generalize.translation[0].definitions[2]: to say that an idea, result etc is related to a larger group
Can the research findings be generalized to a wider population?
